1.name: Linda
day_dialogs: Is that your house? I doubt it.
I have important things to do.
My husband is very rich.
Did you see the latest mansion on the hill?
I don't have time for this.
Some people just don't have class.
Excuse me, I need to get through.
Your outfit could use some work.
I have a spa appointment in twenty minutes.
Real estate prices are through the roof.
Do you even know who I am?
Such pedestrian concerns...
My country club called - they need me.
This neighborhood is getting so common.
night_dialogs: Do you mind?! I'm trying to get to my mansion.
Why are you bothering me at this hour?
I should be home by now.
It's far too late for this nonsense.
My lawyer will hear about this.

2.name: Amy
day_dialogs: Hi! Good morning.
Did you see that bird over there?
What a lovely day.
The weather is so nice today!
Have you eaten breakfast yet?
I love exploring this area.
Everything seems so peaceful.
The sun feels wonderful today.
I found the most beautiful flower earlier.
Have you tried the new cafe downtown?
What a perfect day to go for a walk!
The clouds are so fluffy today.
I'm feeling great this morning!
Care to enjoy the weather with me?
The birds are singing so beautifully.
night_dialogs: I agree, it's pretty dark this time of the day.
I should be heading home soon.
The night air is so refreshing.
I hope the darkness doesn't last too long.
I'm enjoying the quiet of the evening.
The stars are extra bright tonight.

3.name: Bob
day_dialogs: Oh howdy, neighbor.
I'm thinking of getting a truck.
Did you check the market today?
Got any spare parts in that garage?
The weather's been great for work.
I've been tinkering with my old engine.
You looking for work, friend?
Trade business has been steady lately.
Been working on the fence all morning.
Fixing up the house, you know?
Nothing beats honest work.
The garden's looking good this year.
How's business treating you?
Want to grab a beer after work?
Just finished a big job.
night_dialogs: I'll get a job, I know.
Time to call it a day.
The work never stops around here.
Getting too dark to fix anything now.
Been a long day of labor.
Nothing like rest after hard work.
The wife's probably got supper ready.

early_game: I haven't seen you around before.

4.name: Pregnant Mom
day_dialogs: Alright, I'll get you that new toy.
This is my daughter, Molly.
Don't touch that!!
Oh you startled me!, this is my daughter
Look who isn't behaving.
Molly, what did I tell you?
Kids these days, am I right?
Parenting is quite the adventure.
She's been asking for ice cream all day.
Molly needs new shoes already.
Children grow so fast.
We're heading to the park in a bit.
Motherhood is exhausting!
Molly had a good day at school.
Being a parent never gets easier.
Just trying to keep up with her energy.
night_dialogs: Molly should be asleep by now.
Finally got her down for bed.
Hopefully she'll sleep through the night.

5.name: Tony
day_dialogs: Looking for some directions to the bank.
I swear I know where I'm going.
Got any spare change I could use?
I got kids at home to feed...
Do you know what street this is?
Times have been tough lately.
Anyone hiring around here?
Trying to make ends meet, you know?
Can't catch a break these days.
Anybody got work? Any work?
Looking for an odd job or two.
Every penny counts right now.
Been walking all day looking for work.
Things will turn around soon, I hope.
My kids deserve better than this.
One good day, that's all I need.
night_dialogs: Not much out here at night.
The nights get cold out here.
Anyone got a warm place to sleep?
Tomorrow's another day to find work.
At least I made it through another day.
Sleep comes easy when you're exhausted.

6.name: Group
day_dialogs: (Unintelligible Chatter)
(Loud conversation in the distance)
(Group laughing together)
(Sounds of discussion)
(Crowd murmur)
(Overlapping voices)
(Friendly banter)
(Animated discussion)
(Several people talking at once)
(Excited chatter)
(Mixed laughter and conversation)
(Background noise)
(People engaging in heated debate)
(Casual neighborhood chat)
(Group enjoying themselves)

7.name: Security
day_dialogs: Did you know the bank is only open during the day.
Have a good day.
Your deposit is safe with us.
Welcome to the bank.
Security is our top priority.
We're here to help with your finances.
Everything is secure here.
Banking services at your convenience.
Please watch your step.
We appreciate your business.
May I see your identification?
Our team is ready to assist you.
Remember to keep your PIN secure.
Transaction limits apply.
We offer the best rates in town.
night_dialogs: We open again in the morning.
We're not open for night deposits.
